description:
Tree pruning in the Barnsbury Conservation area
Notification has been received of intent to carry out the following tree works:
Sycamore - Lift to over the road by up to 5.5m above ground level and by up to 4m above ground level for the remainder. 
                         Prune back to clear the front elevation of the church by up to 2.5m

Lime          - Lift to crown break at approximately 7m above ground level. 
                         Prune back to clear the side elevation of the church by up to 3m.

Lime          - Lift to crown break at approximately 7m above ground level. 
                         Prune back to give up to 3m clearance from the property.  

Plane         - Lift to crown break at approximately 7m above ground level. 
                         Prune back to give up to 3m clearance from the property.  
                         Prune to remove overhang to the property by the crown reduction of approximately 20% of branch length.  
                         Shape in to the remainder of the crown to leave a natural outline. 
                         Remove deadwood.

Plane         - Lift to crown break at approximately 7m above ground level. 
                         Prune back to give up to 3m clearance from the property.  
                         Prune to remove overhang to the property by the crown reduction of approximately 20% of branch length.
                         Shape in to the remainder of the crown to leave a natural outline.
                         Remove deadwood.

Plane         - Lift to crown break at approximately 7m above ground level. 
                         Prune back to give up to 3m clearance from the property.  
                         Prune to remove overhang to the property by the crown reduction of approximately 20% of branch length.
                         Shape in to the remainder of the crown to leave a natural outline.
                         Remove deadwood.

The trees are numbered
